papers.title: A Real-Life Study in Patients Newly Diagnosed with Autoimmune Hashimoto’s Thyroiditis: Analysis of Asthenia as Admission Complaint
papers.purpose_of_work: To analyze the thyroid panel in newly diagnosed Hashimoto’s Thyroiditis patients to assess the relationship between asthenia as an admission complaint and thyroid function.

papers.title: A Prospective Study to Evaluate the Possible Role of Cholecalciferol Supplementation on Autoimmunity in Hashimoto's Thyroiditis
papers.purpose_of_work: To assess the therapeutic role of Vitamin D in managing Hashimoto's Thyroiditis
